long_description: When the days get shorter and darker, The North Face Illuminated hat makes sure you get brighter with 360deg of reflectivity to catch the eye of motorists. Lightweight polyester exterior with polyester/elastane mesh panels breathes well to help your head stay cool when you're working up a sweat. Stretch clasp closure in back allows the hat to fit most head sizes.
short_description: When the days get shorter and darker, The North Face Illuminated hat makes sure you get brighter with 360deg of reflectivity to catch the eye of motorists.
